remarks: An ordered pair theorem for finite integers.  Analogous to ~ nn0opthi . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 1-May-2012.)
statement: omopth $p |- ( ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om ) /\ ( C e. _om /\ D e. _om ) ) -> ( ( ( ( A +o B ) .o ( A +o B ) ) +o B ) = ( ( ( C +o D ) .o ( C +o D ) ) +o D ) <-> ( A = C /\ B = D ) ) ) $.
